name: The Lair of the Bicorne
tagline: Rugged, broken ground choked with brambles and smashed trunks. Ruined buildings collapsed into ditches.

procedural.encounter_notes: At night, there is a 2-in-6 chance of encountering a hunting party of 2d4 sleepwalking shorthorns

description: Rugged, broken ground choked with brambles and smashed trunks. Ruined buildings collapsed into ditches.

points_of_interest.name: The Pit
points_of_interest.description: Near the north-west corner of the hex is a redwood tree that appears to have been ripped from the earth by giant hands. Beneath it is a great deep pit that reeks of blood and carrion. Within the pit lairs an ancient monster known as the Bicorne, stirring from its fitful dreams of late.
points_of_interest.entering: The pit itself is sheer-sided and 70′ deep. Each character entering the pit has a 1-in-6 chance of waking the Bicorne.
points_of_interest.interior: The base of the pit is carpeted with Speckled Sporange and Purple Nightcap mushrooms. At one side, a rough, 50′ long chamber is burrowed out, most of which is filled with old bones. The Bicorne lies in this chamber in a nearly dormant state, belching forth contagion and nightmares.
points_of_interest.exploring: 2d20 decent specimens of each mushroom type can be gathered. Treasure hoard is buried among the bones and detritus of the lair.
points_of_interest.inhabitants: The Bicorne lairs within the chamber. At night, sleepwalking shorthorns hunt for sentient beings to capture and bring to the lair.
special_features: Treasure hoard: 5,676gp, 6,332sp, 10,099cp, three mouldy spell books, Holy Shield, bronze casket, silver locket

items.name: Mouldy Spell Books
items.description: Set of three mouldy spell books with half of the spells still readable: Rank 1 Floating Disc, Glyph of Sealing, Rank 2 Mind Crystal, Rank 3 Haste

items.name: Holy Shield
items.description: Shiny silver Holy Shield, somewhat dented, engraved with narwhals. The wielder gains the ability to speak with whales.

items.name: Silver Locket
items.description: Silver locket with a portrait of a longhorn noblewoman wearing a saffron sash. Belonged to the sister of Commander Lockelope.

secrets: The sleepwalking shorthorns are summoned from Galblight (hex 0409) by the Bicorne's enchanted whisper
Captured sacrifices are tossed into the Bicorne's pit, where the beast shreds them in psychic agony
dm_notes: The Bicorne is a Large Monstrosity with Level 10, AC 17, HP 68. It has immunity to mundane weapons (suffers only 1 damage), but cold iron weapons inflict normal damage. It can use cloud breath thrice a day, causing paralysis for 9 Turns on failed Save Versus Blast.
